Pix.css A collection of simple boilerplate scss and html that is easy to modify and extend.

How it's organized

scss/
├── essentials/
│   ├── variables.scss
│   └── tools.scss
├── generic/
│   ├── base.scss
│   └── typography.scss
├── components/
│   ├── buttons.scss
│   ├── grid.scss
│   ├── form.scss
│   ├── accordion.scss
│   ├── modal.scss
│   ├── tabs.scss
│   ├── table.scss
│   ├── dropdown.scss
│   └── tooltips.scss
└── utilities/
    └── utilities.scss

Essentials

Variables

Use to store commonly used values. Its good practice, and makes the project easily maintainable. Some ideas for variables:

  • screen-size,
  • color,
  • background.
/* Screen sizes */
$screen-xs: 450px;
$screen-s : 800px;
$screen-m : 1200px;

@media screen and (max-width: $screen-xs) { … }
@media screen and (max-width: $screen-s) { … }
@media screen and (max-width: $screen-m) { … }

Tools

Fluid mixin
Fluid 
<span class="fluid-example">Fluid example</span>
.fluid-example {
  @include fluid(50px, 20px, font-size);
}
Darken & lighten
button {
  background: dodgerblue;
}
button:hover, button:focus {
  background: darken(dodgerblue, 15%);
}

A quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.

  • Unordered
  • List
  • Example

  2. List
  3. Example

<h2>Heading 2</h2>
<h3>Heading 3</h3>
<h4>Heading 4</h4>
<h5>Heading 5</h5>
<h6>Heading 6</h6>

<ul>
    <li>Unordered</li>
    <li>List</li>
    <li>Example</li>
</ul>
<hr>
<ol>
    <li>Ordered</li>
    <li>List</li>
    <li>Example</li>
</ol>

<button class="btn-primary" disabled>Disabled</button>
<button class="btn-primary loading">Primary</button>
<button class="btn-primary error">Primary</button>

Form

Value for <label class=""> can be one of the following:

  • block,
  • inline,
  • centered,
  • space-between.

Value for <fieldset class=""> can be one of the following:

  • block,
  • inline,
  • split-evenly.




Legend

Legend 
<label for="option" class="block">
    <span>Options</span>
    <select id="option" name="">
        <option value="">First option</option>
        <option value="">Second</option>
        <option value="">Third</option>
    </select>
</label>
<label for="message" class="block">
    <span>Your message</span>
    <textarea id="message" name="" rows="4" placeholder="Hi, I'd like to say…"></textarea>
</label>
<label for="toggle" class="space-between">
    <span>Toggle</span>
    <input type="checkbox" id="toggle" name="">
    <div class="toggle"></div>
</label>
<fieldset class="block">
    <legend>Legend</legend>
    <label for="checkbox1" class="inline">
        <input type="checkbox" id="checkbox1" name="">
        <div class="checkbox"></div>
        <span>One</span>
    </label>
    <label for="checkbox2" class="inline">
        <input type="checkbox" id="checkbox2" name="">
        <div class="checkbox"></div>
        <span>Two</span>
    </label>
    <label for="checkbox3" class="inline">
        <input type="checkbox" id="checkbox3" name="">
        <div class="checkbox"></div>
        <span>Three</span>
    </label>
</fieldset>
<fieldset class="split-evenly">
    <legend>Legend</legend>
    <label for="radio1" class="centered">
        <input type="radio" id="radio1" name="radio">
        <div class="radio"></div>
        <span>One</span>
    </label>
    <label for="radio2" class="centered">
        <input type="radio" id="radio2" name="radio">
        <div class="radio"></div>
        <span>Two</span>
    </label>
    <label for="radio3" class="centered">
        <input type="radio" id="radio3" name="radio">
        <div class="radio"></div>
        <span>Three</span>
    </label>
</fieldset>

Accordion

This accordion is has active class

Accordion content

There's a nested accordion inside

Accordion content

Nested accordion

Accordion content

<div class="accordion active">
    <span class="accordion-summary">This accordion is has active class</span>
    <span>Accordion content</span>
</div>
<div class="accordion">
    <span class="accordion-summary">There's a nested accordion inside</span>
    <span>Accordion content</span>
    <div class="accordion">
        <span class="accordion-summary">Nested accordion</span>
        <span>Accordion content</span>
    </div>
</div>

Modal

<button data-open-modal="modalID">Open modal</button>
<div id="modalID" class="modal">
    <div class="modal-content">
        <div class="modal-header">Header</div>
        <div class="modal-body">…</div>
        <div class="modal-footer"><button data-close-modal>Close</button></div>
    </div>
</div>

Tabs

Tab 1 Tab 2 Tab 3
Tab 1
Tab 2
Tab 3
<div class="tabs">
    <nav>
        <a href="#tab1">Tab 1</a>
        <a href="#tab2">Tab 2</a>
        <a href="#tab3">Tab 3</a>
    </nav>
    <div class="tab-content" id="tab1">Tab 1</div>
    <div class="tab-content" id="tab2">Tab 2</div>
    <div class="tab-content" id="tab3">Tab 3</div>
</div>

Table

Index Name Email Status
1 Abraham Alpha abe@email.com Online
2 Benjamin Beta ben@email.com Offline
3 George Gamma george@email.com Offline
4 Daniel Delta danny@email.com Online 
<table>
    <thead>
    <tr>
        <th>Index</th>
        <th>Name</th>
        <th>Email</th>
        <th>Status</th>
    </tr>
    </thead>
    <tbody>
    <tr>
        <td data-label="Index">1</td>
        <td data-label="Name">Abraham Alpha</td>
        <td data-label="Email">abe@email.com</td>
        <td data-label="Status">Online</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
        <td data-label="Index">2</td>
        <td data-label="Name">Benjamin Beta</td>
        <td data-label="Email">ben@email.com</td>
        <td data-label="Status">Offline</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
        <td data-label="Index">3</td>
        <td data-label="Name">George Gamma</td>
        <td data-label="Email">george@email.com</td>
        <td data-label="Status">Offline</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
        <td data-label="Index">4</td>
        <td data-label="Name">Daniel Delta</td>
        <td data-label="Email">danny@email.com</td>
        <td data-label="Status">Online</td>
    </tr>
    </tbody>
</table>

Dropdown

Dropdown (default)
Link 1 Link 2 Link 3
Dropdown from top right
Link 1 Link 2 Link 3
Dropdown from bottom right
Link 1 Link 2 Link 3
Dropdown from bottom left
Link 1 Link 2 Link 3 
<div class="dropdown">
    <p>Dropdown (default)</p>
    <div class="dropdown-content">
        <a class="dropdown-item">Link 1</a>
        <a class="dropdown-item">Link 2</a>
        <a class="dropdown-item">Link 3</a>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="dropdown">
    <p>Dropdown from top right</p>
    <div class="dropdown-content from-top-right">
        <a class="dropdown-item">Link 1</a>
        <a class="dropdown-item">Link 2</a>
        <a class="dropdown-item">Link 3</a>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="dropdown">
    <p>Dropdown from bottom right</p>
    <div class="dropdown-content from-bottom-right">
        <a class="dropdown-item">Link 1</a>
        <a class="dropdown-item">Link 2</a>
        <a class="dropdown-item">Link 3</a>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="dropdown">
    <p>Dropdown from bottom left</p>
    <div class="dropdown-content from-bottom-left">
        <a class="dropdown-item">Link 1</a>
        <a class="dropdown-item">Link 2</a>
        <a class="dropdown-item">Link 3</a>
    </div>
</div>

Tooltips

Hover me!
Hover me!
Hover me!
Hover me! 
<span data-tooltip-top="Tooltip on top">Hover me!</span>
<span data-tooltip-right="Right">Hover me!</span>
<span data-tooltip-left="Left">Hover me!</span>
<span data-tooltip-bottom="Down under">Hover me!</span>

Utilities

Link
Link 
<a href="" class="link">Link</a>
Card
Card
<div class="card">Card</div>
Align
Left
Center
Right
<p class="align-left">Left</p>
<p class="align-center">Center</p>
<p class="align-right">Right</p>
Hide & show
Hide on extra-small screen
Hide on small screen
Hide on medium screen
Show on extra-small screen
Show on small screen
Show on medium screen 
<span class="hide-xs">Hide on extra-small screen</span>
<span class="hide-s">Hide on small screen</span>
<span class="hide-m">Hide on medium screen</span>
<span class="show-xs">Show on extra-small screen</span>
<span class="show-s">Show on small screen</span>
<span class="show-m">Show on medium screen</span>
Flex

A simple flexbox utility. Just add class="flex" and complementary classes.

Flex direction

  • fd-row
  • fd-col
  • fd-row-rev
  • fd-col-rev

Align items

  • ai-center
  • ai-start
  • ai-end
  • ai-stretch

Justify content

  • jc-center
  • jc-start
  • jc-end
  • jc-around
  • jc-between
  • jc-evenly
First span Second span Third span 
<div class="flex fd-col ai-center">
    <span>First span</span>
    <span>Second span</span>
    <span>Third span</span>
</div>
First span Second span Third span 
<div class="flex jc-between">
    <span>First span</span>
    <span>Second span</span>
    <span>Third span</span>
</div>
Margin & padding

Syntax (example being class="p-a-m"):

  • p meaning padding, can also be m for margin,
  • a meaning all sides, can also be x, y, t, r, b, l for horizontal, vertical, top, right, bottom, and left,
  • m meaning medium, can also be xs, s, l, xl for extra small, small, large, and extra large.
